TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Stop playing with paper boats in your soup, finish your lunch and do your homework.

Sensei! Is this soup as insubstantial, as the plate is?

It is made of one-dimensional strings that make up the bowl, soup, and plate. You just need to eat it fast, or it will blink out of existence.

Waiter, there's a bowl in my soup!

17 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Stop playing with paper boats in your soup, finish your lunch and do your homework.

This isn't: "Mom, there's a __________ in my soup!"  

(also it was a reference to Portal/Halflife reference)

Its our special bowl soup!

Waiter! There's a 4 funneled ocean liner in my soup that ISNT sinking!

That's because the iceberg melted in your soup.

 

Waiter there is portal in my soup!

Beware the marauding armies of Dutchmen.

Waiter! There's a highly volatile compound in my soup!

Oh just ignore the cya- er, I mean anonymous compound.

Waiter! There is le wild rage comic in muh soup! FFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU!

Whoops! I accidentally dropped my phone into your soup...sorry!

Waiter! There's a villain who is number one in my soup!

It's our cook. Don't eat him.

Mr cook, please, stop washing in the cooking pot and return to your duties.

Doooooooot, doot-doot-doot-doot-doot-dooot-doooooot.

Waiter! There seems to be a magic mushroom in my soup.

It's not magic.

Mushroom! Get out from his soup!

'Tis not a mushroom, but a Blemmigan from the Tomb Colonies...

 

Waiter! Do we really have to eat the crew if the ship runs out of supplies?

Not all of them... Just the toesies!

Waiter! There's a large amount of RP-1 in my soup!

Sorry, just haven't washed the soup bucket after our jet refueling.
Please, take the matches and make a barbecue.

Waiter, here come dat outdated meme

Edited March 9, 2017 by Mr. Me

Promptly overwritten by server hack.

 

Waiter, my drink is empty and requires refill!

Oh sir, your glass is just too big! I'll get you a smaller one

Waiter, there's an iPhone in my soup!

If this were Galaxy S7, you would no more worry.

Waiter, is this aphabet soup left-to-right or right-to-left?.

21 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

If this were Galaxy S7, you would no more worry.

Waiter, is this aphabet soup left-to-right or right-to-left?.

It's made in Japan, so it's from right to left.

Waitress! There's a Nokia in my soup!

Good luck digesting it, since it well-nigh indestructible.

Waiter! My lithium broth seems a bit warmer than usual...
Waiter, please get out of my soup, you need a shower!

I'm sorry, sir, but this IS my shower.

Waiter, there's an intact ice cube in my soup!

Cool it might sing soon ^^

waiter there's a "not very diplomatic" in my soup ^^

Yes, it's not a diplomat, it's a cleaning staff.

Friends, get out from his soup.

Yeah, friends, do that.

Waiter! There's a Galaxy Note 7 in my soup!

Well, you don't want cold soup, now do you?

Waiter! Someone's complaining about their soup, in my soup!
